strapiPost.title: Distinguished Development Brings Contemporary Living to the Core of Downtown Bentonville
strapiPost.content:
Sophistication and location intersect at the new SEG4 Townhome Community, offering a distinguished, luxury townhome lifestyle in the heart of Bentonville’s Market District — just a stroll away from The Momentary and 8th St Market.

Urban & Urbane: SEG4 offers one or 2-bedroom floorplans with superior quality finishes in a cultivated, cosmopolitan environment located at 402 SE G St. — making your doorstep a gateway into the many trails, parks, dining, and entertainment options of Downtown Bentonville.

See it & Believe it: Explore this distinguished new development and marvel for yourself during an Open House Happy Hour this Friday, Aug 25, from 3-5.

Find SEG4 photos and floorplans HERE.
